item.title: Baxter ExactaMix
item.description: <p>This advisory contains mitigations for Use of Hard-coded Password, Cleartext Transmission of Sensitive Data, Missing Encryption of Sensitive Data, Improper Access Control, Exposure of Resource to Wrong Sphere and Improper Input Validation vulnerabilities in Baxter's ExactaMix automated pumping system.</p>
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Baxter PrismaFlex and PrisMax
item.description: <p>This advisory contains mitigations for Cleartext Transmission of Sensitive Information, Improper Authentication and Use of Hard-Coded Password vulnerabilities Baxter's PrismaFlex and PrisMax critical care devices.</p>
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Baxter Phoenix Hemodialysis Delivery System
item.description: <p>This advisory contains mitigations for a Cleartext Transmission of Sensitive Information vulnerability in Baxter's Phoenix Hemodialysis Delivery System.</p>
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Baxter Sigma Spectrum Infusion Pumps
item.description: <p>This advisory contains mitigations for Use of Hard-coded Password, Cleartext Transmission of Sensitive Data, Incorrect Permission Assignment for Critical Resource, and Operation on a Resource After Expiration or Release vulnerabilities in Baxter's Sigma Spectrum Infusion Pumps.</p>
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: BIOTRONIK CardioMessenger II
item.description: <p>This advisory contains mitigations for Improper Authentication, Cleartext Transmission of Sensitive Information, Missing Encryption of Sensitive Data, and Storing Passwords in a Recoverable Format vulnerabilites in BIOTRTONIK's CardioMessenger II portable monitoring products.</p>
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: BD Alaris PCU
item.description: <p>This advisory contains mitigations for an uncontrolled resource consumption vulnerability in BD Alaris PCU products.</p>
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Johnson Controls exacqVision
item.description: <p>This advisory contains mitigations for an Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature vulnerability in Johnson Controls' exacqVision video surveillance systems.</p>
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Mitsubishi Electric MC Works64, MC Works32
item.description: <p>This advisory contains mitigations for Out-of-bounds Write, Deserialization of Untrusted Data, and Code Injection vulnerability in Mitsubishi Electric's MC Works 64 and MC Works 32 SCADA software.</p>
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: ICONICS GENESIS64, GENESIS32
item.description: <p>This advisory contains mitigations for Out-of-Bounds Write, Deserialization of Untrusted Data, and Code Injection vulnerabilities in ICONICS GENESIS 64 and GENESIS 32 SCADA systems.</p>
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document

item.title: Rockwell Automation FactoryTalk Services Platform
item.description: <p>This advisory contains mitigations for an Improper Input Validation vulnerability in Rockwell Automation's Factory Talk Services Platform software.</p>
item.dc:creator: Advisory Document
